header.content: Creates a package in the workspace under the supplied name.

value.name: repo
value.description: The repository of the package source.

value.name: dir
value.description: The directory of the package source.

value.name: file
value.description: The file name of the package source.

value.name: path
value.description: The path of the package source in 3 space delimited parts.

value.name: uri
value.description: The path of the package source in uri format in one part.
